quaint_stock_seahorse_fetch: An open-source judging system designed for judges and judge advisors to evaluate teams and conduct award deliberations for the VEX Robotics Competition.
still_honest_koala_dance: You could join by clicking the invite link directly or pasting the link below and clicking "Join".
knotty_brave_nils_ascend: Please enter a Judges' Room URL
performance_awards_description: Based on robot performance in matches and skills challenges. Default order follows Qualifying Criteria precedence <AW1>. Drag to reorder if needed.
judged_awards_description: Determined by judges based on award criteria. Default order follows Qualifying Criteria precedence <AW2>. Drag to reorder if needed.
volunteer_nominated_awards_description: Determined by volunteer staff and not by Judges. Sportsmanship Award and Energy Award can be dragged to this section.
upload_csv_again: Please upload a CSV file from RobotEvents or Tournament Manager
upload_csv_first: Please upload a CSV file first
event_name_whitespace_error_message: Event name must not have leading or trailing whitespace
event_name_too_long_error_message: Event name must be 100 characters or less
team_import_description: Import teams using CSV files from RobotEvents or Tournament Manager.
download_csv_from_robotevents: Download CSV from RobotEvents: Event Admin → "Downloads & Links" → "Download Tournament Manager Import Data"
download_csv_from_tournament_manager: Download CSV from Tournament Manager: File → Export → "Team List for Event"
award_name_whitespace_error_message: Award name must not have leading or trailing whitespace
award_name_too_long_error_message: Award name must be 100 characters or less
at_least_one_grade_level_must_be_selecte: At least one grade level must be selected
number_of_winners_must_be_greater_than_0: Number of winners must be greater than 0
number_of_winners_must_be_10000_or_less: Number of winners must be 10,000 or less
require_notebook_option_description: Check if this award requires teams to have a notebook
require_team_interview_option_descriptio: Check if this award requires teams to have completed a team interview
no_divisions_found_in_robotevents_messag: No divisions found in RobotEvents. Please select a division manually.
error_getting_event_teams_in_division: Error Getting Event Teams in Division
event_code_setup_description: If your event is listed on RobotEvents.com, enter the event code below which can be found in the event page on RobotEvents.com.
event_code_setup_description_2: Judges' Room will automatically import many settings for your event. In addition, please enable the feature to publish live results to RobotEvents in the Web Publish Setup page of Tournament Manager. This way, Judges' Room can automatically calculate the team eligibility for Excellence Awards and Think Award based on the latest rankings and skills scores.
event_code_setup_description_3: If your event will have two or more divisions:
event_code_setup_description_4: Please use Tournament Manager to set the division for each team and publish the division results to RobotEvents first. Judges' Room needs to know which teams belong to which division before it starts.
event_code_setup_description_5: Each Judges' Room can only be used for one division. Please use a second computer, another browser or incognito mode to create another Judges' Room for the second division.
event_code_setup_description_6: Judges' Room can only calculate Excellence Award(s) for its own division (division specific). If your event has event wide Excellence Award(s), please refer to the "Excellence Award Eligibility" reports from the Reports tab in Tournament Manager.
official_event_description: Connect to RobotEvents and determine the team eligibility based on the live results.
delete_judge_group_message: Are you sure you want to delete this judge group? If this judge group has been used for judging, all related rubrics and award rankings will be lost forever. This action cannot be undone.
remove_judge_message: Are you sure you want to remove this judge? If this judge submitted any rubrics, they will be lost forever.
walk_in_judging_description: Teams queue up and are assigned to judge groups randomly.
pre_assigned_judging_description: Teams are pre-assigned to specific judge groups. Judges find their assigned teams in their team pits for interviews.
all_active_teams_assigned_to_judge_group: All active teams are assigned to judge groups
drag_and_drop_teams_description: Drag and drop teams from here to judge groups. Right-click to select multiple teams.
all_teams_assigned_to_judge_groups: All teams are assigned to judge groups
please_create_at_least_one_judge_group: Please create at least one judge group to continue.
please_assign_all_active_teams: Please assign all active teams to judge groups to continue.
review_license_description1: This software is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3). Join our
help_us_improve_judgesroom_com: Help us improve judgesroom.com by sharing anonymous usage data. This includes metrics like number of teams, judges, and devices. No judging content or personal information is collected. See our
how_do_you_want_to_import_from_roboteven: How do you want to import from RobotEvents?
import_teams_description: Import team list only. Existing teams not in the import will be removed along with their judging data. Teams with matching numbers will preserve their existing data.
import_full_setup_description: Import both teams and awards. The award list will be reset and you'll need to reconfigure custom awards. Awards with matching names will preserve their rankings.
organize_teams_description: Drag and drop teams between groups to organize them. Right click to select multiple teams. Team groups are useful when determining the final ranking of award winners.
no_teams_available: No teams available. Please import teams in the previous step.
